column1: Stand together like we're rocks in a wall
column2: 如那高强凝聚的石块般同舟共立
column4: 每一天都比从前更坚强挺立
column5: Stand together in the eye of the storm
column6: 在那风暴的中心齐心共济
column7: And show the whole world who we are oh
column8: 向世界秀出我们真正的自己
column9: Keep on walking to the sound of the drums
column10: 随那战鼓之声持续前进
column11: Feel the fire run through our lungs
column12: 感受那火般热烈穿肺钻心
column13: Find our treasure in the light of the sun
column14: 在那旭日光芒中寻得我们珍视的珍惜
column15: And show the whole world who we are oh
column16: 向世界秀出我们真正的自己
